```{r}
library(RgoogleMaps)
library(tidyverse)
library(usmap)
library(maptools)

```

```{r}
x <- c("38.189646")
y <- c("-76.433142")
site <- c("SMCM Dock")

SP <- data.frame (site, lat  = c("38.189646"),
                  lon = c("-76.433142")
                  ) %>%
  mutate(lat = as.numeric(lat),
         lon = as.numeric(lon))

transform <- usmap_transform(SP)
```

```{r}
plot_usmap("counties", fill = "lightgreen", alpha = 0.25,
           include = c("24037", "24009", "24017", "24033"),
           labels = T) +
  geom_point(data = transform, aes(x = x, y = y),
             size = 4) +
  theme(legend.position = "right", text = element_text(size = 12))
```


```{r}
bubbleMap(SP, coords = c("x", "y"), crs = sp::CRS("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84"))
```
